settings.title: Order early in the week for delivery by the weekend.
Order your Wagyu at least 3 days before your event.
Order in bulk, over $250, and get free shipping.
How will my Wagyu be packaged for delivery?
settings.text: Your package will come in a box labeled Temperature Sensitive Product so our delivery service knows they have precious product on board. Inside this box, your Wagyu is placed on dry ice inside foam padding that completely surrounds the meat to ensure the ultimate protection.

settings.title: Where do you ship to and is there a minimum requirement for ordering?
settings.text: We ship our frozen Wagyu products to the lower 48 of the United States, requiring a minimum order of $40.

settings.title: Can you ship to my P.O. box?
settings.text: Unfortunately, we can only ship to a street address, guaranteeing a delivery. P.O. box addresses are not accepted.

settings.title: What should I do if there is an issue with my order?
settings.text: If there is an issue with your order, please reach out to us via phone, email, or chat on our website.

settings.title: How do I track my order?
settings.text: Once you have placed your order and it ships, you will receive an email with tracking information.

settings.title: What if my Wagyu arrives thawed or partially thawed?
settings.text: If your Wagyu is thawed or partially thawed, please reach out to us via phone, email, or chat on our website.

settings.title: Can I change or cancel my order? How do I do this?
settings.text: Your order may be changed or canceled as long as it has not been shipped. One of our Wagyu experts can assist you with changing or canceling your order, just reach out to us via phone, email, or chat on our website.

settings.title: What happens if there is inclement weather on the forecast during the time of my delivery?
settings.text: Inclement weather may cause delivery delays beyond our control. In extreme circumstances, we may contact you about holding a shipment at our facility if bad weather is expected in your area during transit.

settings.title: Is there a way to make sure my order is fully protected when it is on its way to me?
settings.text: Shipping insurance through Shiptection is offered at checkout to protect lost, damaged, or stolen shipments. We are not liable for uninsured orders that are delayed or damaged while in the possession of UPS.
